title: My Stickers
description: Save and send your Custom Stickers in Microsoft Teams and Outlook.
tips: My Stickers (formerly Custom Stickers) for Outlook is in Preview
protoMsgExtTitle: Save Images as Stickers from chat messages
protoMsgExtSubTitle: Chat message with popover and reactions
protoMsgExtStep1: Click or hover on the next message
protoMsgExtStep2: Click <0/> (more icon, the right one of the reactions)
protoMsgExtStep3: Click <0/>(the last button in the menu list)
protoComposeSubTitle: Componse editor with popover from Componse Extension
protoComposeIntro: You can send your own stickers, After you install this extension. ❤
protoComposeIntroTip: You may need to PIN it to the edit bar, from more extensions icons(...), by left click.
protoComposeStep2: 2. Click the sitcker that you want to send
